io.github.daveho.funwithsound

Class Composition

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.daveho.funwithsound.Composition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<PlayFigureEvent>

    public class Composition
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<PlayFigureEvent>
    A composition is a collection of PlayFigureEvents specifying rhythms and melodies to be played on specified instruments at specified times.

        public void addEffect(Instrument instr,
